title: Journey back to Oz
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
description: Your favourite characters from "The Wizard of Oz" return for another adventure with plenty of excitement and new songs. Dorothy's dream to return to the land of Oz where she experienced a world of magic is fulfilled when another cyclone hits, transporting Dorothy and Toto to Oz. Together they travel to the beautiful Emerald City where the Scarecrow (Mickey Rooney) has become King of Oz. Dorothy befriends Pumpkinhead (Paul Lynde) who tells her of the evil witch, Mombi (Ethel Merman), who has a devilish plot to destroy the city and rule as Queen. Her secret weapon, the brute force of a horde of Green Elephants. Her old friends, The Tinman (Danny Thomas) and The Cowardly Lion (Milton Berle) are unable to help her on this adventure and suggest she seeks help from Glinda, the Good Fairy. Dorothy's voice is supplied by Liza Minnelli.
